runs.comm: beats him first ball, back of a length and Smith was aiming to drive through the off side
on off stump, defended to midwicket
almost a terrific catch! Smith heaved a back-of-a-length ball over mid-on. Michael Lumb runs back from inside the circle and isn't far from making up the ground
short and hammered, Smith loves it there and he pulled it behind square
goes full now, drilled to Lumb and mid-on...that hit him, more than Lumb stopping it and he's in a bit of pain
short ball and it costs the full amount, surely England have learnt? Smith rocks back and effortless pulls over deep backward square
back of a length, on off stump, defended
touch fuller, on middle with a hint of swing, Gayle clips down to long leg
good delivery, full on off stump, some shape for Dernbach, defended to mid-on
angled into the pads, Smith can't clip it away
short of a length, outside off, he opens the face and but can't quite beat Hales at short third man

oh goodness, that's massive...and out of the ground. Dropped in a fraction short, Gayle takes a step to leg then pulls it over deep midwicket. It hits the roof of the stand and bounces out of the ground.
on a full length, angling into the pads, clipped to the right of mid-on
full outside off, Gayle goes from launching a huge six to leaving one alone
he charges again, it's a short-of-a-length delivery, Gayle is aiming another mighty blow over deep midwicket but instead gets a big top edge towards third man who makes an excellent save
an outside edge for six! Full outside off, Smith swings with all his power and it clears the third man boundary
full and straight, clubbed to mid-on and travels too quickly for a single
another clean strike from Smith, and it's really not much more than a clip as he flicks a full delivery over midwicket...problems for England. A terrific flick of his bottom hand to direct that shot
nice start, flattish on off stump, defended
comes down the track, works it from outside off to midwicket
good stuff from Tredwell, Gayle just nudges to the leg side again
it wasn't going to take long, this ball is a fraction fuller and he drives it straight down the ground. Didn't come out of the middle
that's huge! A step down the pitch and a wonderful clean strike straight as you like. He's seeing them okay.
out of his crease again, opts to block this time. For dot balls, but the over still cost 10
it's short, but this time doesn't cost anything...actually beats Smith for pace as he goes for a pull
and he can do delicate as well, although Dernbach will call it an edge...short of a length outside off and Smith glides it off the top edge just wide of the keeper
now he gets him...this was a touch fuller, Smith shaping to work it to the leg side, it perhaps straightened on him a touch and a big leading edge looped high to cover
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
good delivery, but well played as it bounced a touch on Samuels outside off and he took his bottom hand of the bat as the edge went to third man
slips this down the leg side
tucks this away from outside leg stump and walks the single, almost stopping for a quick chat and a drink with Samuels on the way
dragged down short and dispatched into the stands, that was freebie for Gayle and he pulled it over deep square-leg
not quite so in control this time, came down the pitch and lifted his head on the shot as he tried to go through midwicket...the pad acts a second line of defence
a small appeal for lbw as he misses another swing to the leg side
it's all going leg side, this off a think inside edge to square leg
quick and flat, fired down the leg side as Gayle advanced and he swings one handed
a louder appeal for lbw, Gayle missing a sweep this time, but it's not really close...good comeback from Tredwell after the six
beats him first ball, feeling for a delivery outside off...Buttler doesn't take it cleanly
short of a length, tucked to midwicket
nice delivery, fuller outside off, beats the edge as Samuels lunges at it...the ball not quite melting into Buttler's gloves
full and straight, rolling his fingers over the ball, pushed back down the pitch
shorter delivery, Samuels plays it off the back foot and it rolls to backward point
works this away off his hip...another effective over from Bopara
round the wicket to the right hander, short on leg stump, nudged through midwicket
this slides down the leg side as Gayle goes to sweep...may have brushed the pad
clubs a length delivery rather ungainly through midwicket
clipped off the pads to deep midwicket
touch more flight, Gayle leans forward and defends
excellently done from Tredwell as Gayle just works this from off stump to midwicket
back of a length, driven down to long-on
round the wicket, full at the stumps, slung down to long-on
shorter delivery, defended to backward point with an open face
was that an edge? Buttler has shelled a few off Bopara standing up. Not sure there was a nick but reaction suggested there might be. It bounced a touch at Samuels as he tried to open the face
guides down to third man
just short! Gayle pulling and it drops in front of Morgan at midwicket then rebounds to the man in the deep
comes down over the top of this delivery and sweeps to deep square
another good contest, Samuels wants to use his feet but can only find midwicket
pushed wider outside off as Samuels comes down the pitch, drives out to deep cover although he had to reach for it
full outside off, patted into the off side
I think that's gone to St Lucia...Gayle is down the track and deposits the delivery over the stands at wide long-on. Ha, he wasn't really to the pitch at all
using his feet again, this time he's not as close to the pitch so defends
angled down to third man
dragged on! The fun is over for Gayle. An legspinner from Bopara, aims to go through the off side and gets a bottom edge into the stumps. Ravi has enjoyed that.
goes back over the wicket, shortish and Simmons plays back, towards backward point
outside off, again Simmons sits in the crease, runs one off the open bat face to third man
Samuels comes forward and drives square, can't beat backward point
good length, tight on off stump, pushed back to the bowler - good over from Bopara and the crowd acknowledges it
tossed up on the stumps, plays an inside-out drive through the covers for one
comes down the wicket, Samuels doesn't really get hold of this, bit of a slog between long-on and deep midwicket, Bresnan collapses on it in front of the rope
drags his length down as Samuels comes forward again, works one to long-on
bit of width, late cut from Simmons and played delightfully well, steering it powerfully behind point for four
there he goes again, whipping his hands through a cut! It wasn't all that wide but supremely well played by Simmons, placed in front of the fielder at backward point
on the stumps, comes forward and dabs one to long-on
full toss to begin with, clunked through the covers for just one
down the leg side, Buttler can't collect it cleanly and Simmons had come three quarters of the way down and had to hurry back as short fine leg cleaned up. Not called wide
pitched up and hit on the pad, there's an appeal, Samuels played round it, probably missing leg
throws the hands, thick outside edge and the ball flies past the keeper, Tredwell does solidly to prevent four
bit of width and this is again flayed past backward point, another wristy cut for four for Simmons
slower ball, outside off, pushed back down the ground for one
tossed up, pushed back from in front of the wicket
full, pitching on middle and leg, worked through midwicket for a single
length, straightening on the stumps, clipped through the leg side
darted towards leg stump, Simmons nurdles one more down the ground to long-on
little bit of air, on the stumps, can't get this past mid-on coming forwards
length ball drifting to the leg side, nudged through square for another single - just four off the over
Wright serves up a half-volley in the slot and Samuels tucks in, time to tie a napkin around his neck and then thump this clean over the sight screen
glances this firmly off his hips, past the infield and heading for another boundary, Moeen makes a really good sliding attempt to rein it in but replays undermine his efforts
full and in the blockhole, chops past his stumps, off an inside edge
full and wide, Simmons nicks it on the drive! Good take from Buttler, went straight in, Wright is delighted, charging around... England need wickets, they've got themselves a third
length ball, outside off, plays this delicately down to third man for a single to get going
pitched up, outside off, driven for a single to long-off
full and wide, only just inside the tramlines, Samuels toes ends it to short extra cover on the bounce
short and at the batsman, who waits and flicks one past square leg
grippy cutter, in the channel and Russell tries to swing it over cow corner, misses by a mile
pitched up outside off, plays with a straight bat, pushes one to long-off
length ball outside off, steered towards point
on the stumps, back of a length and nurdled to midwicket, where Bopara gives chase

length ball, hits down the ground... but long-on runs to his left to take the catch! Hales it was, he held it well, Samuels looks disconsolate before trudging off. Wasn't full enough to get it off the middle, never had the distance

top-edged and caught by Hales at mid-on, Bresnan has two in two! Russell has buckled under the pressure, tried to blast this over midwicket, an ugly hack across the line, ballooned into the air and again well taken. The ex-pats in the crowd are making some noise now!
length, towards leg stump, nudged away behind square to stem the bloodflow
bit of width and that's neatly played, flowing square drive from Bravo, nice way to get off the mark
on the stumps, dropped short on the leg side, Bresnan scurries to collect in his follow through
pitched up outside off, punched down the ground to long-off
full, maybe a slower ball, lofted down the ground, bounces a few yard short of long-off
swings wildly, haymaker across the line and gets a top-edged four to third man, which was unguarded. Took on the bouncer and it paid off
Dernbach slips in the yorker now, tailing on off stump, Sammy jams the bat down, single to short fine leg
another well-directed full bunger, Bravo nearly loses a toe squeezing it to square leg
Dernbach gets the yorker wrong, comes out as a low full toss and Sammy mullers it through deep midwicket, a flat six! The balance tips back West Indies' way
slower ball, out the back of the hand, waits and dabs it square from in front of off
pitched up and driven down the ground for one to long-off
full and straight, Bravo had walked across his stumps, clips straight to midwicket but they get one

nailed it, six over long-off! Sammy has some stones on him, the captain knows he has to finish this off, he sits and waits for the yorker, it's not quite full enough and he rams it back into the baying crowd
bangs this in very short, Sammy pulls out of his shot as it flies through... and called wide, correctly, to Bresnan's annoyance

another straight six, this time an extraordinary muscle down the ground! Nothing wrong with the delivery, full and in the blockhole, Sammy just crunches it through long-on, the arms windmilling through a brutal stroke

short and wide and lashed through point, that's beating the fielder, wins it with a boundary - Sammy finishes with 30 off nine balls, a blistering knock to give his side a five-wicket win, sealing the series with one to play
